mapper.select: SELECT 'F' + SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 112), 3, 6) + REPLICATE('0', 4 - LEN(CONVERT(VARCHAR, ISNULL(MAX(CONVERT(INT, SUBSTRING(X.GUID, 8, 4))), 0) + 1))) + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ISNULL(MAX(CONVERT(INT, SUBSTRING(X.GUID, 8, 4))), 0) + 1) FROM IRIS_COM_ITG_RDCS X WHERE SUBSTRING(X.GUID, 1, 7) = 'F' + SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 112), 3, 6)
